name: Touch of Flame
description: Your grenades ignite targets, causing them to burn over time and deal increased damage. Improves grenade functionality passively.
effect: Grenades automatically ignite enemies on hit

name: Heat Rises
description: Consuming your grenade allows you to fire weapons while gliding and extends airborne time. Provides airborne weapon accuracy and time extension.
effect: Hold grenade button to consume and activate airborne benefits
interaction: Hold grenade button to consume grenade

name: Electrostatic Mind
description: Arc ability or jolted enemy defeats grant Ionic Traces that automatically return ability energy when collected.
effect: Automatically spawns Ionic Traces from Arc kills

name: Arc Soul
description: Gain an Arc Soul when using Rift, becoming amplified, or casting your Super. The Arc Soul automatically fires at enemies.
effect: Automatically summons Arc Soul companion

name: Feed the Void
description: Void ability kills activate Devour, automatically healing you and granting grenade energy with each kill.
effect: Void kills activate Devour automatically

name: Child of the Old Gods
description: Cast Rift to automatically summon a Void Soul that seeks out enemies, weakening and draining them.
effect: Rift automatically spawns Void Soul

name: Chaos Accelerant
description: Hold the grenade button to overcharge your grenades, increasing their damage and enhancing their effects.
effect: Improves grenade effectiveness when charged
interaction: Hold grenade button to overcharge before throwing

name: Bleak Watcher
description: Convert your grenade into a stationary Stasis turret that automatically slows and freezes nearby targets.
effect: Grenade becomes a turret that automatically engages enemies

name: Iceflare Bolts
description: Shattering frozen targets automatically creates seekers that track and freeze other nearby enemies.
effect: Shattering spawns automatic tracking projectiles

name: Glacial Harvest
description: Freezing targets automatically creates Stasis shards around the frozen target for ability energy.
effect: Freezing spawns Stasis shards automatically

name: Frostpulse
description: Casting Rift automatically sends out a freezing wave that freezes all nearby targets.
effect: Rift automatically freezes nearby enemies

name: Mindspun Invocation
description: Grappling to targets grants melee energy. Consuming a Tangle grants class ability energy. Passive energy gains.
effect: Automatic energy regeneration from Strand interactions

name: Weaver's Call
description: Casting Rift automatically creates Threadlings that seek out and attack enemies autonomously.
effect: Rift spawns Threadlings automatically

name: The Wanderer
description: Destroying Tangles creates a Rift at their location. Your Rifts grant you and allies Woven Mail automatically.
effect: Rifts provide automatic Woven Mail buff

name: Knockout
description: Critically wounding targets or breaking shields increases melee damage and restores health automatically.
effect: Critical hits and shield breaks trigger automatic buffs

name: Touch of Thunder
description: Your Arc grenades have enhanced functionality automatically, with improved effects and capabilities.
effect: Grenades receive automatic enhancements

name: Juggernaut
description: While sprinting, you automatically build up a frontal shield that blocks incoming damage.
effect: Sprinting generates shield automatically

name: Controlled Demolition
description: Hitting targets with Void damage causes them to explode automatically when killed, chaining damage.
effect: Void-damaged enemies explode on death automatically

name: Offensive Bulwark
description: While you have an overshield, grenades charge faster and melee damage is increased automatically.
effect: Overshield provides automatic combat bonuses

name: Bastion
description: Cast Barricade to grant you and nearby allies an overshield. You deal increased melee damage passively.
effect: Barricade grants overshields, passive melee damage boost

name: Sol Invictus
description: Solar ability kills restore health and create Sunspots automatically that grant restoration when standing in them.
effect: Solar kills spawn healing Sunspots automatically

name: Roaring Flames
description: Solar ignitions and final blows increase your Super and ability damage automatically. Stacks up to 3 times.
effect: Solar kills grant automatic damage stacks

name: Tectonic Harvest
description: Shattering a Stasis crystal automatically creates Stasis shards that grant melee energy when picked up.
effect: Shattering spawns Stasis shards automatically

name: Cryoclasm
description: Slide further and automatically shatter Stasis crystals and frozen targets you slide into.
effect: Enhanced slide with automatic shattering

name: Diamond Lance
description: Shatter or defeat frozen targets to create a Stasis lance automatically that can be thrown to freeze enemies.
effect: Freezing effects spawn throwable lances automatically

name: Into the Fray
description: Destroying a Tangle grants you and nearby allies Woven Mail and grants grenade energy automatically.
effect: Tangle destruction provides automatic buffs

name: Drengr's Lash
description: Activate your class ability to snap a devastating Strand whip that suspends targets.
effect: Class ability enhanced with whip attack
interaction: Normal class ability activation triggers whip

name: Banner of War
description: Defeat targets with abilities to plant your banner automatically, granting restoration and melee damage to you and allies.
effect: Ability kills spawn buff banner automatically

name: Knock 'Em Down
description: Golden Gun precision hits and ignitions grant bonus Super energy automatically. Golden Gun has increased duration.
effect: Precision hits extend Super and grant energy

name: Gunpowder Gamble
description: Defeat targets with Solar ignitions to charge an explosive Solar projectile automatically.
effect: Ignition kills charge a throwable explosive
interaction: Press charged melee when ready to throw

name: On Your Mark
description: Precision final blows grant you and allies increased weapon reload and handling automatically for a short time.
effect: Precision kills provide automatic weapon buffs

name: Flow State
description: Defeating jolted targets makes you amplified automatically. While amplified, dodging reloads your equipped weapon.
effect: Jolt kills trigger amplified automatically

name: Lethal Current
description: After dodging, your melee lunge range is increased and your next melee strike jolts the target automatically.
effect: Dodge grants automatic melee enhancements

name: Trapper's Ambush
description: Activate Quickfall to perform a dive that makes you and nearby allies invisible and weakens enemies.
effect: Dodge becomes a dive with additional effects

name: Stylish Executioner
description: Defeating weakened, suppressed, or volatile targets grants invisibility and Truesight automatically.
effect: Debuffed enemy kills grant automatic invisibility

name: Vanishing Step
description: Dodging makes you invisible and grants you and nearby allies damage resistance automatically.
effect: Dodge provides automatic invisibility and buffs

name: Grim Harvest
description: Defeating frozen or slowed targets automatically creates Stasis shards that grant melee energy.
effect: Stasis kills spawn shards automatically

name: Winter's Shroud
description: Dodging slows nearby targets automatically. Slow dodges also grant you and nearby allies increased damage.
effect: Dodge applies slow and damage buffs automatically

name: Touch of Winter
description: Your grenades have enhanced functionality automatically, creating additional freezing effects.
effect: Grenades receive automatic enhancements

name: Threaded Specter
description: Activating your class ability leaves behind a decoy that draws enemy fire and explodes automatically.
effect: Dodge spawns decoy automatically

name: Widow's Silk
description: Your grapple creates a persistent tangle automatically that can be picked up by allies and exploded.
effect: Grapple creates tangles automatically

name: Whirling Maelstrom
description: Destroying Tangles grants you bonus class ability energy and grants Woven Mail automatically.
effect: Tangle destruction provides automatic benefits
